Container.Name: defguard - Core
Container.Overview: defguard is a true Zero-Trust WireGuardÂ® VPN with 2FA/Multi-Factor Authentication, as each connection requires MFA (and not only when logging in into the client application like other solutions). [br] This is the core component of defguard, which may required for the other components to work (gateway, proxy)
Container.Category: Network:Proxy Network:VPN Network:Privacy Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
